PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.text_mode_is_windows
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Format to use when saving class text. True means using Windows text format, False means using Unix text format.

PREF.NAME: general.console_shell_command
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Command used to launch a console.

PREF.NAME: general.external_editor_command
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Command used to launch an external editor.
